com.couchbase.kafka

Class CouchbaseReader

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.couchbase.kafka.CouchbaseReader

  • public class CouchbaseReader
extends Object
    CouchbaseReader is in charge of accepting events from Couchbase.
    Author:
    Sergey Avseyev

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description

      Creates a new CouchbaseReader.

    • Method Summary

      void run(com.couchbase.client.core.dcp.BucketStreamAggregatorState state, RunMode mode)
      Executes worker reading loop, which relays events from Couchbase to Kafka.

    • Constructor Detail

      • CouchbaseReader

        public CouchbaseReader(List<String> couchbaseNodes,
                       String couchbaseBucket,
                       String couchbasePassword,
                       com.couchbase.client.core.ClusterFacade core,
                       StateSerializer stateSerializer,
                       ConnectWriter writer,
                       Integer maxDrainRate)
        Creates a new CouchbaseReader.
        Parameters:
        couchbaseNodes - list of the Couchbase nodes to override CouchbaseEnvironment.couchbaseNodes()
        couchbaseBucket - bucket name to override CouchbaseEnvironment.couchbaseBucket()
        couchbasePassword - password to override CouchbaseEnvironment.couchbasePassword()
        core - the core reference. // * @param dcpRingBuffer the buffer where to publish new events.
        stateSerializer - the object to serialize the state of DCP streams.
